headline.main: DANGERS TO INDIA STRESSED BY AMERY; Secretary Urges Unity Because War May Draw Closer From East and West Soon DEFENSE COUNCIL CREATED Wedgwood Tells Commons of Ignorance Here on Britain's Record With India

abstract: Brit Commonwealth war effort: Sec L S Amery urges Indian unity in effort
